title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS, THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE, HONORABLE NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON, TO ACCEPT AND SIGN THE DEED OF DONATION FROM IGLOO SUPPLY CHAIN PHILIPPINES, INC., WITH OFFICE ADDRESS AT MANGGAHAN LIGHT INDUSTRIAL PARK, 1611 EULOGIO ”AMANG” RODRIGUEZ AVENUE, PASIG CITY, CONSISTING OF FORTY- EIGHT (48) PIECES OF 3 X 1.2 METER LONG-SPAN ROOFING MATERIALS FOR THE REHABILITATION OF THE MUNICIPAL MATERIAL RECOVERY FACILITY THEREBY SUPPLEMENTING THE RESOLUTION NO. 2025-179 OF THE SANGGUNIANG BAYAN OF LOS BANOS.
